subject: Dogfighting
Sentences (Criminal)
Prisons and Prisoners
lead_paragraph: Michael Vick’s co-defendants were sentenced to longer prison terms than the government had recommended on Friday, something legal experts said doesn’t bode well for the star quarterback.
snippet: Michael Vick’s co-defendants were sentenced to longer prison terms than the government had recommended on Friday, something legal experts said doesn’t bode well for the star quarterback.
